property.name: Text
property.value:

property.value:

This turn, the character gains COVERT. Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an attacking or blocking party is formed, it must have an even number of members.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Deploy this only if you have at least 5 cards in your deck. Deplete up to 5 characters you control. X is the number of characters you deplete this way.
Search your deck for 5 cards and reveal them. An opponent chooses X of those cards. Put the chosen cards into your hand and the rest into your discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value:
FORESIGHT
COST: Deplete this card.
EFFECT: Look at up to the top 5 cards of any one deck. Put them back in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value:

NULLIFY

property.name: Text
property.value: While you have an even number of cards in your hand, this card gains 1 strength, 1 life, and 1 speed.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Your opponents cannot respond to this card. Pick an opponent.
That player discards a card. You may deploy a non-resource card with numeric cost X or less for free, where X is the numeric cost of the discarded card. (You still need to meet its threshold and satisfy its extra costs.) Repeat this card's effect until that player has no cards in their hand.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Name a card.
Search your deck for any number of copies of the card and reveal them. Put 1 into your hand and the rest into your discard pile. An opponent may search your deck for any number of copies of the card. If they do, put them into your discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a non-resource card.
Put the card into its owner's hand. Look at an opponent's hand and choose a card in it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Text
property.value:

At the start of your turn, you may pick a non-resource card you control. If you do, put a token on it.

property.name: Text
property.value:
You may remove any number of tokens from cards you control. Use the tokens to generate the following effects any number of times:
1 TOKEN: Pick a character. Inflict 1 damage to it.
2 TOKENS: Draw a card.
2 TOKENS: An opponent discards a card.
3 TOKENS: Search your deck for a card and put it into your hand.

property.value:

OPTION 3: Each player may draw up to 2 cards.
OPTION 4: Each player may play up to 2 resources.

This card gains 1 strength and 1 life for each token on it.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your turn, each player puts the top 2 cards of their deck into their discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value:
UNIQUE EVONDAN
All your other sarcophyle characters gain 1 speed.
If a character would be destroyed during a turn when this card damaged it, take control of that character instead. Reduce the amount of damage already inflicted to it this turn to 0. It gains the sarcophyle subtype.
When this card is destroyed, destroy all other sarcophyle characters.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Flip a coin. If you win, X is 2. Otherwise, X is 1.
An opponent discards X cards at random. Put any items discarded this way into play under your control.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a gear card. Pick a character.
Take control of the gear card. Attach it to the character.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a character or faction.
Inflict 5 damage to the character or faction.

property.name: Text
property.value:
This card gains 1 strength for each token on it.
At the start of your turn, you may pick a character you control. If you do, destroy it. Put X tokens on this card, where X is the destroyed character's strength when it was destroyed. Otherwise, destroy this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card attacks, you may pick a character. If you do, deplete it.

property.name: Text
property.value:
FIRE!
COST: Deplete this card. Pick 2 or fewer characters.
EFFECT: Inflict up to 2 damage divided however you want to the characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card is blocked, it gains 2 strength and 2 life this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value:
At the start of your turn, put a token on the character with the highest strength. If there is a tie, you decide which character gets the token.
All characters gain 1 strength for each token on them.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a character.
This turn, the character gains 5 strength.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card gains 1 strength and 1 life for each dragon card you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your turn, you may pick a character an opponent controls. If you do, destroy it. Otherwise, destroy this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: This turn, your characters gain 5 strength.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your turn, you may pick a character. If you do, this card inflicts X+1 damage to it, where X is the number of dragon cards you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: An opponent's faction loses 2 influence. Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a blocking character.
Inflict 3 damage to the character.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: You may pick 2 or fewer characters.
When this card enters play, if you picked characters as part of its cost, inflict up to 2 damage divided however you want to those characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your turn, you may pick a character. If you do, deplete it.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Flip a coin. If you win, X is 2. Otherwise, X is 1. Pick X or fewer items.
Destroy the items.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card inflicts damage to a faction, you may pick an item. If you do, destroy it.

property.name: Text
property.value:
SHARPSHOOT
COST: Pay 1. Deplete this card. Pick a character.
EFFECT: Inflict 1 damage to the character.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a card is depleted, that card's controller's faction loses 1 influence. (Resources don't deplete when used; they attach to your faction.)

property.name: Text
property.value:
ATTACH TO CHARACTER
The attached character gains 2 strength.
HANDOFF
COST: Pay 3. Deplete a character you control that is not in a battle.
EFFECT: Attach this card to the character.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, inflict 1 damage to all your opponent's characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this card is attacking, you may assign its battle damage to the target of the attack instead of the blocking party.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of your turn, if this card started the turn under your control and did not attack this turn, destroy it.

property.name: Text
property.value: All your characters gain 1 strength.

property.name: Text
property.value:
UNIQUE RUDOLPHUS
PUNCH
COST: Pay 2. Deplete this card. Pick a character. X is its strength. Y is this card's strength.
EFFECT: Inflict X damage to this card. Inflict Y damage to the character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Inflict 2 damage to all characters.

property.name: Text
property.value:
BATTERING RAM
COST: Pay 2. Destroy a resource you control.
EFFECT: An opponent's faction loses 1 influence.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Choose a number for X. Pay X+X. Pick a character.
Inflict X damage to the character.

property.name: Text
property.value: While an opponent controls a character, this card gains 1 strength and 1 life.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Deploy this only while you are attacking. X is the number of members in the attacking party.
This turn, all members of the attacking party gain X strength and X life.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Your opponents cannot respond to this card.
If you deployed this card in response to a tactic, terminate the tactic. This turn, tactics cannot be deployed.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a character.
Inflict 2 damage to the character.
